transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji Nitesh ji se baat ho rahi hai, Shri Ram Lakhani.
Executive: Ha sir ha.
Customer: Ji Nitesh ji ka Ansh Malhotra se IndiaMART office se aapki baat ho rahi hai. Ha Friday evening hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir boliye.
Executive: Ji, woh yeh mujhe iska final puchna tha sir kya karna hai agar aapka refund pending tha. Full amount ke liye toh sir mana ho gaya hai, jo pending amount hai wohi aapko mil payega. Toh aap bataiye main process karwa du ya phir kar du.
Customer: Sir aapne last time gaya tha main koshish karunga aapne kaha Monday ko.
Executive: Maine koshish kiya tha, maine mail dala hua tha, mail par maine try kiya confirmation lene ke liye but mere ko udhar se reply mil gaya. Toh unhone bola hai ki jo pro data basis se calculation banke jo amount aayega wohi refund ho payega. Toh aap bataiye aap okay karte hai toh main yaha se download karwa du.
Customer: Aapke liye mere ko aap aaj yeh karwa dijiye jo October ka kata hai na usko refund dilwaiye.
Executive: Sir nahi mil payega sir, tab jis din tak ki service chal rahi hai us din tak ka service chalega. Main aaj download karwa du.
Customer: Sir maine October mein use hi nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Sir isme use karna na karna ispe depend nahi karta. Visibility toh company aapki pure time dikha hi rahi hai na sir. Aap use karte toh bhi hum aapko nahi bolte kyu use kiya. Aap use nahi kare hai toh bhi hum aapko nahi bolenge kyu nahi kiya. Aaj bhi aapki service abhi chal rahi hai. Aap isko use kare ya na kare agar koi customer unko enquiry dalega toh woh aapke number pe land hogi hogi, aapke mobile pe land hogi hogi sir. Woh use karna toh woh aapke upar depend karega na sir pura. Customer call bhi kar sakta hai toh woh bhi aapke paas hi aayega sir yeh cheez.
Customer: But sir maine October mein use nahi kiya na.
Executive: Sir woh October ka aapke kam process sir ek use karne wala one time try karke dekh lijiye.
Customer: Suniye suniye suniye. Sir main already try kar chuka hu agar try nahi kiya hota toh main aapko meri himmat hi nahi thi main aapko call karta. Maine aapko call isliye kiya hai kyuki main try kar chuka hu maine mail bhi dali thi aapke jo discussion hua tha na woh bhi mere seniors ne suna hai. Usi ke basis pe mujhe jo unhone confirmation diya hai ki pro data pe ho payega isi wajah se maine aapko woh inform karne ke liye call kiya sir.
Customer: Ab main yeh keh raha hu sir dekhiye last time October se maine na try kiya tha beech mein but woh usko jyada der tak khichne ki koshish kari ki bhai October bhi nikal jaye. Fir mera usme October bhi cancel kar liya gaya.
Executive: But ab ab aap bataiye ab dekhiye November naya mahina start hua isliye main aapke clearly puch raha hu agar aap okay hai toh hum isko process kar lete hai right. Agar aap okay nahi hai toh aap mujhe bataiye kyuki jaise hi aap mujhe bolenge ki ha isko download kara dijiye main deletion ke liye jaunga aur further kaam start karunga. Agar aap bolenge ki nahi mujhe abhi aur sochna hai toh phir aap time dijiye mujhe koi problem nahi hai. Ultimately hum ek conclude conclusion pe aana padega. Hamari taraf se jo ho sakta tha woh maine aapko inform kiya isliye. Wohi main aapke discuss karna chah raha hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji aap jaisa decision lenge main usi ke hisab se aage update de paunga aur usi ke hisab se aage action le paunga.
Customer: Thik hai sir karwa dijiye refund aap karwa hi nahi rahe hai isko jo karna hai.
Executive: Main download ke liye process kar de raha hu sir thik hai na. Ho sakta hai aapke paas koi call aaye toh aap baad mein solve karwaiye nahi.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir jo solve ho sakta tha mere level pe jo meri authority thi jitni mujhe permission di uske hisab se maine aapke liye approval liya. Warna maturity ke basis pe company kisi ko refund allow hi nahi karti hai. Aapki majburi samajh ke isliye maine woh request dala ki nahi sir ko chahiye refund aur yeh yeh scene hai tab jaake mujhe uska permission bhi mila aap samajhne ki koshish kijiye.
Toh main ek kaam kar de raha hu main yaha pe na aage update dal de raha hu thik hai aur refund ke liye isko process kara raha hu. Within day or two mein aapki services close ho jayegi aur yeh aapka process ho jayega refund ke liye. Thik hai sab thik hai. Toh kitna aayega yeh nahi bataya aapne.
Executive: Sir maine bataya toh tha us din aapko lumsam 25000 ke aas paas bataya tha. 5000 upar niche ho sakta hai kyuki woh services ke band hone pe depend karta hai ki kaunsi tarikh ko band hui hai.
Customer: Sir ab main use toh le nahi raha uska band toh ab sir 6 din lag jayega toh woh bhi count hoyega.
Executive: Sir 6 din kyu lagega sir main aaj download request create karunga 2 se 3 din ka time lagta hai download sir aap 3 din bhi nahi lagte. Saturday baat hui thi last time.
Customer: Friday baat hui hai sir Saturday Sunday ki baat nahi hui hai aap se. Aur Friday bhi maine aapko bola tha ki main aapko pehle ek baar check kar leta hu ki refund hoga ki nahi hoga. Isi wajah se itna delay hua warna toh main Friday hi download karwa deta.
Customer: Karwa dijiye aap.
Executive: Thik hai isko download ke liye na process kar raha hu aap mujhe ek kaam kar dijiyega jo aapka bank details jis mein aapko wapas chahiye sir right. Aap mujhe.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Main keh raha tha jo aapka bank details hai na jis ke through aapne payment kiya tha woh mujhe ek baar WhatsApp pe dal dijiyega account number. Sir thoda mujhe payment dusre account mein chahiye hoga. Maine kya karu jis account se jis account se payment hua hai na sir usi account mein transfer hoga amount aapka wapas.
Customer: Sir maine hai na credit card se apply kiya tha EMI ke base pe.
Executive: Credit card se payment aaya hua hai sir debit card ka hi hai aapka 33440 ka aur yeh HDFC ka account hai jis se payment hua hai.
HDFC ka current account hai mujhe sir saving account mein refund nahi mil sakta kya.
Executive: Sir jis account se transaction hoti hai usi account mein milta hai automatically but phir bhi main aap se details isliye mang raha hu in case agar unhone mujhse mange details. Toh main aapka share kar dunga aapko saving ka dena aap saving ka de dijiye but ultimately woh mujhse yahi puchenge ki jo current se hua hai matlab HDFC se hua hai ya phir saving account se hua hai kaunse bank ka hota hai aapka saving ka.
Saving bank ka kaunse bank ka account hai aapka? AU.
Executive: AU aap bhej dijiye jo bhi hai main ek baar check kar leta hu thik hai. Thik hai sir main abhi 5 se 10 minute mein bhej raha hu aapke paas mein. Aap bhej dena aaram se koi problem nahi hai. Isi number pe bhej de. Aapke aapke number pe main WhatsApp dal de raha hu just minute. Thik hai aap message kar dijiye main drop kar dijiye main usi pe bhej dunga.
Executive: Okay ji. Aiye main tension sir aapka close kar de raha hu thik hai aur refund process kar de raha hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants refund for October month.

Resolution:

- Executive explained refund policy.

- Agreed to process refund as per policy.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share bank details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, bank details, payment
